## My places in Singapore: work and home


```{r echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
SCIcon <- makeIcon(
    iconUrl = "https://av.sc.com/corp-en/content/images/SC_Full_colour_preview_logo.jpg",
    iconWidth = 50, iconHeight = 50
)

SCsite <- "<a href='https://www.sc.com/sg/' >Standard Chartered</a>"
df <- data.frame(lat=c(1.280218,1.334940),
                 lng= c(103.854130,103.966506))
df %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(icon=SCIcon, popup = SCsite) %>%
    addMarkers(lat=1.368542, ln=103.869332, popup = "Home")
```
